commentBody:
The NBA Finals are just about to start this evening, amazing indeed how far things have come but wow, Mr Kundla's place in this historic event is BIG! So thrilled he IS in the Hall of Fame where he belongs...only wish that maybe there'd been more money in the game back when he played (though clearly he was never about that in his career - he was about the game) so that now in his twilight years, "little things" like being able to pay for basketball games on TV (or him having a digital TV) wouldn't be a big deal.

Basketball owes him at least these "little" things as it sounds like he contributed much to the sport, to players lives at both the pro & college level, especially during complicated times (death threats?) and the road less traveled for one who was already successful - he just did the right thing.

Rings & banners are great, yes but can they not reach out to him now to make sure he's got basketball in his life beyond a night light? Mr Kundla is American basketball history. This is someone being mentioned alongside Phil Jackson, Pat Riley...c'mon! Hello ESPN, Nike, Kobe, Spike Lee, Gatorade? Someone...

replies.commentBody: Hello -NBA Commissioner Adam Silver -This is something you should fix PERSONALLY .Please get Coach Kundla NBA access .Thank you !
